title: Can Tiny Titans Take On The Giants in Generative AI? How Small Language Models Are Matching Up to Large Language Models.
content: With the rapid evolution of large language models (LLMs), the world has begun to rely on the APIs of managed AI models such as OpenAI’s GPT-4. Its cutting-edge capabilities and developer-friendly interface have gained a large fan base not only in academia but also in the industry-wide as well. As every rose has its thorn, there are some downsides to those proprietary APIs despite all the benefits they bring to the table. Performance reliability, uptime predictability, and cost are some of them.
